## Description
The **Load Events (TR) **task allows to load the outcome events received in input (for example, from printing providers) on Tracking &amp; Reporting.

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.
